articles.description: Arsenal will use the "anger, rage and frustration" from their home loss to Bournemouth against PSG on Wednesday, says boss Mikel Arteta.
articles.title: Arsenal to use 'anger and rage' of Bournemouth loss against PSG

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris says he was "very happy" after qualifying at the Miami Grand Prix, despite losing out on pole position to Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Lando Norris 'very happy' after qualifying despite missing out on pole to Max Verstappen

articles.title: Rangers vs Celtic: Scottish Premiership stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Besiktas boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer meets with BBC Sport in Istanbul before he faces Jose Mourinho's Fenerbahce.
articles.title: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer on Besiktas, Man Utd, Jose Mourinho, Harry Maguire & Scott McTominay

articles.description: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez will face Terence Crawford in a Las Vegas super-fight in September after outpointing William Scull in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Alvarez vs Scull: Mexican to fight Crawford in super-fight after dull points win

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries from day three of the latest round of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day three - scores, radio commentary & live text

articles.description: Three-time champion Mark Williams produces a vintage display to defeat world number one Judd Trump 17-14, becoming the oldest ever player to reach a World Championship final.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Mark Williams defeats Judd Trump 17-14 in semi-final

articles.description: The Denver Nuggets beat the Los Angeles Clippers 120-101 on Saturday to seal their passage from the first round of the NBA play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Denver Nuggets beat Los Angeles Clippers to reach Conference semi-finals
